*He coughed as the dust began to settle around the crash sire, flopping out 
of the open door of the cargo-bay and onto the ground.
His systems were crowded with nothingness and had been the exact since 
they�d hit solid land-mass. He was blind.
All that was known was that him and his crew had been on their way towards 
Beta-X to construct a new energon mine when they hit a rift and were 
suddenly thrown towards a blue and yellow/brown planetoid. The computer had 
named it but they were all so busy trying to save themselves that none of 
them heard, and even if any of them had heard they were all dead now and he 
was the only one left, and he hadn�t.  30 min after crashing the DNA 
scanners had come online and now this man had a beast mode and if he was 
able to see he might think that it suited him.
And so, a rather large and blind mole picked himself up from the ground, 
whiskers around his snout twitching and testing the air around him. The 
smell of leaking fuel and death lingering in the air.
His signature gave off a destress signal for many miles around, the mole 
began to sniff around the broken ship, using both smell and touch.
Bold red letters along the side of the ship reading:
CYBERTRONIAN CONSTRUCTION.
A Cybertron ship only 20 clicks away from another one, the CF.*
